name: IV:MP CSharp Mod
short_description:
C# (CSharp) is most powerful and popular Microsoft .Net programming language.

With use of CLR in IV:MP server module, we can load and run custom C# assembly in iv:mp server.
Anything you can do in Squirrel (will be) available on C# special interface.


 - Native IV:MP functions (names like in squirrel)

 - Ability to work with events like with native C# events (automated EventHandlers model)

 - Native C# types and variables, ability to use any .Net feature in server (probably, you should not use WinForms :D)

Requirments:
Windows server, brains to code C#.
Module will work ONLY on Windows servers.

Google Code (SVN): http://code.google.com/p/ivmpcsharp/
summary: Script your server with really professional and simple language!
